subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for undertaking data collection through centralised Network Survey Vehicle (NSV) agencies of NHAI
text: #Rdy 74 WTHRf gfearut (Tgw qae7t &r TTHTf +34, MRG  TGR) National Highways Authority of India 07y4 Trr (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #-5 Q 6, R7-10, ERA51, =ff @ealt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TTHI /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Miscellaneous/2024 Policy Circular No. 18.94/ 2024 dated 29th 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/NSV / NewRFP2O22 (Part 6) (Comp. No. 249553)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for undertaking data collection through centralised Network Survey Vehicle (NSV) agencies of NHAI reg: NHAI HQ has engaged Consultants for providing Network Survey Vehicle (NSV) testing facilities on all National Highways under operation and maintenance phase. For this purpose, the Country has been divided into five zones as per the details mentioned below: Package No: Zone States covered Length Lane Length NSV Agency (in Km) (in Km) Delhi, Haryana, Punjab, Mls TTL Himachal Pradesh, A- North 2,687 11,867 Engineering Uttarakhand & Jammu Pvt. Ltd. & Kashmir Mls TTL 2 B- West Rajasthan, Gujarat 3,915 18,614 Engineering Pvt. Ltd. Mls TTL Maharashtra & Madhya 3 C- Center 4,616 19,335 Engineering Pradesh Pvt. Ltd. Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu; Telangana, Bids under D- South 4,537 19,498 Karnataka, Chhattisgarh evaluation &t Kerala Assam, Bihar, Bids under 5 E East Jharkhand, Meghalaya, 5,179 21,965 evaluation Odisha & Uttar Pradesh Total 20,934 91,279 The detailed list of stretches included in the instant projects are mentioned at Annexure A. 2 Responsibilities of the NSV cell under Highway Operations Unit (HOU) at NHAI HQ; a, All the activities related to procurement of Agencies and the contract management thereafter . b The approval, if required, of NSV equipment to be used for the surveys. C Finalization of data collection schedule in coordination with NSV Agencies and field units of NHAI. d. The processing and analysis of the raw data collected during surveys shall be done by the NSV agency under supervision of NSV cell at NHAI HQs within prescribed timelines as per the contract agreement: Contd__2I - 4aan NHAL May,
